name: Love Love Truck
overview: Love Love Truck is one of the weirdo Japanese games with odd gameplay and idea but turning out to be quite fun. You and a partner are on a cart. Pump the thingy up and down to move, while the partner or you can jump up to grab power ups, energy, time, etc. Seems simple enough. Story wise, you and a partner are among many others looking for a legendary treasure withing the mines. Taking a ,mine cart, you battle the roller coaster maze of rails to find the treasure. Game Modes: - Single Mode: One player game. Choose one of the 4 characters and one of the 4 possible couples and try to pass through all the different rollercoaster worlds. - Twin mode: Cooperative 2 player mode, 2 human player take the role of each of the couple. - Love Mode: Check the compatibility between the couple.
